title: srI ragukula nidim
sahitya:
shrI raghukula nidhim shrtajana paripAlam cintayAmyaham satatam shrI rAmam

anupallavi

 nIrajadaLa nEtram nirupama sucaritra nikhila bhuvana pavitram nija shyAmaLagAtram

caraNam

 dasharatha rAjakumAram dasha mukha ripu samhAram darajA sumanOharam tApatraya vidUram
pashupati hrdaya vihAram parama dayAkaram vAram pAkAri vinuta padam pati shrInivAsa shUram
